{"step_by_step_thinking": "The presence of severe itching over the web of fingers, especially at night, along with the finding of burrows, is highly suggestive of scabies. Tinea cruris is a fungal infection that typically affects the groin area. Infantile eczema is a form of eczema that occurs in infants and young children.
